DOC.brief_summary: This multi center , phase 2 randomize control study determine effect lyophilize plasma patient warfarin therapy .
DOC.brief_title: A Clinical Study Lyophilized Plasma Patients Warfarin
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria 1 . Patients receive oral anticoagulation warfarin derive agent . 2 . Patients need urgent surgery , invasive procedure identification patient active bleed oral parenteral vitamin K therapy deem slow action reversal warfarin anticoagulant effect . 3 . Patients elevate international normalized ratio . Exclusion Criteria 1 . Patients clinically unstable . 2 . Patients congenital acquire coagulopathies ( warfarin therapy ) . 3 . Patients receive medication could interfere result laboratory test . 4 . Pregnant nursing woman . 5 . Patients participate another clinical treatment study currently past 1 month prior study inclusion . 6 . Patients previously enrol study . 7 . Active illicit drug use .
